title: Donkey Kong Country
description: A groundbreaking platformer with pre-rendered 3D graphics where Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong battle King K. Rool and his Kremlings.

title: Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy's Kong Quest
description: Diddy Kong and Dixie Kong set out to rescue Donkey Kong from Kaptain K. Rool.

title: Donkey Kong Country 3: Dixie Kong's Double Trouble!
description: Dixie Kong and her cousin Kiddy Kong embark on an adventure to rescue Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong.

title: Donkey Kong 64
description: A 3D platformer where Donkey Kong and his friends must stop King K. Roolâ€™s evil plans.

title: Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze
description: Donkey Kong and friends battle the Snowmads in a beautifully animated platformer.

title: Metal Gear Solid
description: Stealth action game where Solid Snake infiltrates Shadow Moses to stop FOXHOUND from launching a nuclear strike.

title: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty
description: Snake and Raiden uncover a conspiracy involving the Patriots while battling terrorists on the Big Shell.

title: Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater
description: Set during the Cold War, Naked Snake must stop The Boss and prevent nuclear catastrophe.

title: Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots
description: An aging Solid Snake faces Liquid Ocelot in a world dominated by private military companies.

title: Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker
description: Big Boss builds his own army while confronting nuclear threats in Costa Rica.

title: Metal Gear Solid V: Ground Zeroes
console: PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, Xbox One, PC
description: Prologue to The Phantom Pain where Big Boss infiltrates Camp Omega to rescue Chico and Paz.

title: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain
console: PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, Xbox One, PC
description: Big Boss awakens from a coma and builds Diamond Dogs while seeking revenge against Cipher.
